text: @WhiteHouse @PressSec Yes it was sickening to watch the phoney bone spur coward talking about those who fell in battle and those who fell because of his coronavirus bungling, and knowing there will be many more of them in his frenzy to get the Dow up so he and his rich buddies get even richer.
